name: Overwash!
description:
This game was made during gryfjam 2022 game jam

Topic: timeless travels
Description: The year 4XXX. Atomic bomb who killed humanity torn apart space and time where objects from the past, present and future fall form the sky. For one this is the end of the world but for others is just a biginning. Each year in Gel Screw Tournament, blood thisty washing machines turn on their tubs to sucks and puke objects and throw other oponents from arena. FOR PRIDE (at least for two weeks) and BOX OF WD40!

Become a ultimate fighter!

Credits:

code: Kucharczyk Oskar
code & music: Grizmu: https://grizmu.itch.io/
3D Graphics: Łaszcz Krzysztof
2D & 3D Graphics: Steiger: https://neofuturism.itch.io
